NewsArticle.Title: Oren Fair & Kruna Give Away
NewsArticle.Content:
The Oren Fair will open on September 18th and end on October 2nd. During the Fair, Aislings may purchase clothing from Ertha. Ertha will be selling old and new clothing. Hope everyone can join in on the festivites! ((Only registered characters will be allowed to enter the Oren Fair)) Kruna Give Away
All registered accounts on September 18th will receive 200 Kruna, autorenewal accounts will receive 300 Kruna. New items in the Itemshop will also be released.
